title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat endpoints in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; chat, pull, and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with interactive model picker, config profiles, and plugin system.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node selector support.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible REST endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async options and health checks.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app with admin UI to manage models and expose chat completions via REST.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with Unity and Blazor examples.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from Ollama’s OpenAPI spec; supports chat, embed, pull.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models privately.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators in RAG pipelines.
